Package limitedlibrarymanagementsystem

Class DBController

java.lang.Object
limitedlibrarymanagementsystem.DBController
public class DBController extends Object
A DB Controller class MVC Pattern -> Controller for project Final Project for Programming Patterns course - Fall 2021.

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      public void addBook(Book book) throws Exception
      Creates a new entry in the Books table to add a new book to the catalog. Sets “Issued” attribute to zero and addedDate to the current date.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be added to the library catalog
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • issueBook

      public boolean issueBook(Book book, Student student) throws Exception
      If student information is valid and book is available to be borrowed, the number of copies(“Quantity”) will be decreased by one and the number of Copies issued (“Issued”) will be increased by one. A new entry in “IssuedBooks” table is added.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be issued
      student - the student who wants to borrow the book
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully issued.
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • returnBook

      public boolean returnBook(Book book, Student student) throws Exception
      If the student information is valid and book information for that student is also valid, the number of copies “Quantity” will be increased by one and the number of copies issued will be decreased by one. The corresponding record in IssuedBooks table is deleted from the table.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be returned
      student - the student who borrowed the book
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully returned
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • viewCatalog

      public static Map<String,String> viewCatalog() throws Exception
      This method returns a map containing all data retrieved from the Books table.
      Returns:
      a map of the books in the library
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • viewIssuedBooks

      public static Map<String,String> viewIssuedBooks() throws Exception
      Retrieves all data from IssuedBooks table and returns them as a Map. The map is sorted by “SN”.
      Returns:
      a map of all the issued books
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • updateViewIssuedTable

      public String updateViewIssuedTable() throws Exception
      Updates view/output for the IssuedBook table
      Returns:
      a formatted string that will be used by the GUI in the display text box
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

      Returns:

    • searchBookByTitle

      public List<Book> searchBookByTitle(String title) throws Exception
      Search the book by its title
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book
      Returns:
      a list of books with the specified title, sorted by book SN
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • searchBookByAuthorName

      public List<Book> searchBookByAuthorName(String authorName) throws Exception
      Search the book by its author's name
      Parameters:
      authorName - the name of the author
      Returns:
      a list of books written by the author, sorted by book SN
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

      public List<Book> searchBookByPublisher(String publisher) throws Exception
      Search the book by its publisher
      Parameters:
      publisher - the publisher of the book
      Returns:
      a list of books, sorted by book SN
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • borrow

      public Boolean borrow(Book book) throws Exception
      If the book is available to be borrowed, the number of copies(“Quantity”) will be decreased by one and the number of Copies issued (“Issued”) will be increased by one. A new entry in “IssuedBooks” table is added.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be borrowed
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully issued.
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • toReturn

      public Boolean toReturn(Book book) throws Exception
      If the book information for that student is valid, the number of copies “Quantity” will be increased by one and the number of copies issued will be decreased by one. The corresponding record in IssuedBooks table is deleted from the table.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be returned
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully returned
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • updateViewBookList

      public String updateViewBookList(List<Book> books) throws Exception
      Updates view/output for methods returning list of books (search methods)
      Parameters:
      books - the list of books
      Returns:
      a formatted string
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown
